name: Integration with Hubspot Forms
author: Minnur Yunusov

sections.description:
The Hubspot Forms plugin provides an easy way to embed Hubspot forms anywhere on your site.
Integration with visual editor allows you embed forms by simply choosing a form from the drop down list.
The plugin also provides widgets and you may place site-wide forms in any area of you website.

Donations are always appreciated. Thank you for using my plugin.
sections.installation:
• Please enable the Hubspot Forms plugin.
  • Either use the API Key you already have or generate new https://app.hubspot.com/keys/get
  • If you have Hubspot Salesforce integration, make sure you enable that option on the plugin configuration page.

Notes.

  • When you create a new form in Hubspot please make sure to either add thank you message or add redirect after successful submission.

For more information or customization please contact the author of this plugin.
sections.faq:
Not available at the moment.

Installation Instructions

  • Please enable the Hubspot Forms plugin.
  • Either use the API Key you already have or generate new https://app.hubspot.com/keys/get
  • If you have Hubspot Salesforce integration, make sure you enable that option on the plugin configuration page.

Notes.

  • When you create a new form in Hubspot please make sure to either add thank you message or add redirect after successful submission.

For more information or customization please contact the author of this plugin.
sections.changelog:
1.2.2

  • Fix incompatibility with “Beaver Builder Plugin” plugin reported by @adoerler.

1.2.1

  • Fix JS load issues when HubSpot embedded via Widgets.

1.2.0

  • Fix JS load issues.

1.1.7

  • Add option for HubSpot forms cache
  • Fix JS load issue. Make sure it is only loading when embed code present.

1.1.6

  • Fix typoes in the description.

1.1.5

  • Load HubSpot JS files only once.

1.1.4

  • Remove h2 wraps around forms.

1.1.3

  • Test with WordPress 4.8

1.1.2

  • Test with WordPress 4.7.3

1.1.1

  • Test with WordPress 4.6

1.1.0

  • Add TinyMCE plugin.
  • Add previewable Hubspot forms to WYSIWYG editor.

1.0.2

  • Fix Salesforce campaign ID field issue.
  • Test with WordPress 4.5
  • Refine readme.

1.0.1

  • Refine readme.

1.0

  • Initial release.
